p1: Eurecat's Applied Artificial Intelligence Unit develops innovative solutions (algorithms, methods, platforms) based on the combination of artificial intelligence and knowledge management technologies for variety of sectors. Although our strong focus is on industrial manufacturing, and energy and water resources, our projects are spread in many other fields such as aerospace industry, environmental and climate change, agri-food and agri-food industry, logistics and railway, or construction.
p2: We have a broad experience in interoperability, normalization, and homogenization of raw data, transforming it in fruitful and useful knowledge with data and AI-driven approaches. We make used of hybrid architectures tailored to the specific needs of our clients and projects (small/BIG data, IoT, insight platforms) and develop data-based AI models aimed at overcoming real-world challenges and needs of our society.
